ComicInfo.Title: Chapter VI: God Spark
ComicInfo.Summary:
Players from all sides converge on Brazil. Pitted against the strongest warriors of the Realm of the Gods, will the Awakened be able to reach the Prodigy and begin the end of the world?
And will they all make it out alive?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|--------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Frank William, Felipe Watanabe | 1, 2 | | B | Cover B | Doaly | 3 |
